last_episode_to_air.name: No. 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rumi is faced with a devastating ultimatum — go after Luna, or lose Roy forever. A figure from Luna's past returns to her life.

name: Tooth Pari: When Love Bites
overview: A rebellious vampire with a broken tooth falls for a shy dentist on the streets of Kolkata but will human and mystical forces keep them apart?

episodes.name: Upar Neeche
episodes.overview: After breaking a tooth while hunting for blood, Rumi crosses paths with Roy, a timid dentist. Kartik, an outcast cop, looks into a mysterious case.

episodes.name: The Cutmundus
episodes.overview: Roy's rare blood sparks interest from Rumi's clan, as Sreela is sent after him. Kartik’s case sends a signal to a secret cabal of vampire hunters.

episodes.name: Climate Change
episodes.overview: When a vampire is killed, an awakened Ora bans access to the human world above ground. Hell-bent on revenge, Rumi seeks help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Badshah is taken underground. Kartik learns about his father's past from Luna Luka. At a family dinner, Roy grows suspicious over Rumi's true nature.

episodes.name: Darinda
episodes.overview: Badshah is taken underground. Kartik learns about his father's past from Luna Luka. At a family dinner, Roy grows suspicious over Rumi's true nature.

episodes.name: Tyajet Kularthe Purusham
episodes.overview: The death of a Cutmundus member leads Luna down a vengeful path. Believing that Roy is a vampire, a desperate Kartik resorts to blackmail.

episodes.name: Meet the Parents
episodes.overview: Dinner at the Roy's turns into a night of drunken revelry, while Rumi and Roy take an intimate step. Later, Badshah's revelation puts Rumi in danger.

episodes.name: No. 30
episodes.overview: Rumi is faced with a devastating ultimatum — go after Luna, or lose Roy forever. A figure from Luna's past returns to her life.
